78.movie_plot: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

106.movie_plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

96.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

35.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
35.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

10.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

136.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

170.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

110.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

77.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

75.movie_plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?

76.movie_plot: An intimate portrait of the controversial cartoonist and his traumatized family.

39.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

176.movie_plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

107.movie_plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

69.movie_plot: An exploration of how completely different the television series is from the film. The cast and filmmakers underwent quite a change in order to create the film X Files, The (1998). We are ...

147.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

4.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

58.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

29.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

162.movie_plot: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

112.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

139.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
139.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

135.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

87.movie_name: Man Bites Dog (C'est arrivé près de chez vous) (1992)
87.movie_plot: A film crew follows a ruthless thief and heartless killer as he goes about his daily routine. But complications set in when the film crew lose their objectivity and begin lending a hand.

1.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

164.movie_plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

64.movie_plot: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

120.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

167.movie_plot: A crew in Antarctica finds a neighboring camp destroyed and its crew dead. Whatever killed them is nowhere to be found, unless it's hidden in plain sight.

104.movie_plot: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.

24.movie_plot: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone who must continue her battle against the aliens. Along with a crew of space pirates, Ripley must also prevent the deadly aliens from reaching Earth.

148.movie_plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

113.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

131.movie_plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

52.movie_plot: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

98.movie_plot: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

189.movie_plot: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

25.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

156.movie_plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield to kill again.

184.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

19.movie_plot: When C.I.A. Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an I.R.A. assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

93.movie_plot: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

51.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

3.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

127.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
127.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

95.movie_plot: When a girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

21.movie_plot: After a successful heist, Porter is shot by his wife and his best friend. They leave him there to die but when he recovers, he seeks revenge and wants his share of the money.

180.movie_name: Seven Samurai (The Magnificent Seven) (Shichinin no samurai) (1954)
180.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

134.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

108.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

124.movie_plot: The staff of an army hospital in the Korean war find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

146.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)
146.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

54.movie_plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

101.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

159.movie_plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

32.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

182.movie_plot: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

89.movie_plot: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

71.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

116.movie_plot: Mike Nelson and his robot companions watch and give their comments about This Island Earth (1955).

188.movie_plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

166.movie_plot: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association of how women become different and immobilized robots.
